title: What is the most attractive blog topic in Technology world? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question is hard to answer because there are many topics. Technology has wide range of topics. But from my point of view bitcoin and blogging itself is most attractive blog topics these days. Because bitcoin rate is going very high from few months and everyone thinks blogging is easy to make money online. May be after some time this trend can change but these days these two topic are hot than uranium in technology. Show your Appreciation by Upvoting!

I'd say that are topics that are related to the new technologies that are replacing our regular life style and things we used to have in our life. Something brand new that changes qualify of our life, like invention of the engine and a car instead of horses :) From my point of view one of those things become Setapp (setapp.com) a subscription service that includes every app you may need in your daily routines, relax or work purposes.
